text: tæ brrda phu thi yakerng phracea khxng phwk khea nan sahrab phwk khea khux brrda swn swrrkh sung mi mæna hlay say hil xyu beuxng lang khxng swn swrrkh lea nan doythi phwk khea ca phanak xyu nı swn swrrkh hela nan tlxd kal thangni pen sthan thi rabrxng thima ca kxallxh læa sing thi mi xyu n xallxh nan khux sing thi di ying sahrab phu thi pen khn di thanghlay
